about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience in building modern web applications. My expertise includes React, Node.js, and cloud technologies.
about.description2: I love creating elegant solutions to complex problems and am constantly learning new technologies to stay at the forefront of web development.
about.description3: When I'm not coding, you can find me contributing to open-source projects, writing technical blog posts, or exploring new design trends.
